description: Minor Material Amendment pursuant to Conditions 9 (Parameter Plans), 10 (GEA Floorspace Limits), 34 (BREEAM) and 52 (Wind Mitigation) of part outline and part detail planning permission 2017/6762 dated 28th March 2019. The amendments consist of:- Removal of residential (C3) and ground floor retail/commercial (A1-A5/D1-D2) floorspace from Plot A (-9,972sqm and -307sqm GEA respectively);- Amendments to the height of Block F3 (+6.4m or two storey equivalent) within Plot F and Block E2 (+4.95m or three storey equivalent) within Plot E;- Amendments to the height of Building G (+5.925m to accommodate increased residential floor to floor heights);- Amendments to the building footprints of Plots E/F/G;- Amendments to the residential (C3) floorspace of Plots E/F/G (+12,673sqm GEA);- Amendments to the distribution and quantum of retail/commercial (A1-A5) and community (D1-D2) uses within Plots E/F/G (-42sqm GEA);- Amendments to the parking, servicing, storage and plant floorspace of Plots E/F/G (-4,677sqm GEA);- Amendments to the area of Linear Park (+83sqm); and- Associated revisions to the approved Design Codes for Plots E/F/G to accommodation the above amendments.This application is made as a further minor material amendment to the part outline and part detailed planning permissions 2016/2424 (dated 23/01/2017) and 2011/2462 (dated 30/03/12) for "Demolition of all existing buildings and construction of a mixed use redevelopment comprising 7 building plots with buildings up to 23 storeys high to provide residential units; commercial and community floorspace; associated basement parking and part of the 'Nine Elms Linear Park'. All matters reserved apart from the appearance and scale of Blocks B1, D1 & G and two new access points from Nine Elms Lane."
